definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa

sentences.english: Why harm the child’s future for such a selfish desire?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要为了如此的一己私欲而损害孩子的未来呢？

sentences.english: Individual plights vanish in these here shadows.
sentences.chinese: 一己的愤懑消散在这些影子中。

sentences.english: Alone and single-handed, Bahá'u'lláh would achieve sovereignty over it.
sentences.chinese: 巴哈欧拉单凭一己之力就能获得对它的统治。

sentences.english: Flag is willing to do their own power.
To pledge myself uphold and practice the ideals of Zonta.
sentences.chinese: 以一己赤诚，维护和实行崇她理想。

sentences.english: In a sense, the market seemed to be hauling itself up by its own bootstraps.
sentences.chinese: 某种意义上，市场上升凭得似乎是一己之力。

definition: everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
by fair means or foul/by hook or by crook/unscrupulously
to make a profit/to gain/to get an advantage
harming others for one's personal benefit (idiom); personal gain to the detriment of others
